node.doctext:
Phase 1 - Current Featureset documentation

- We are here
  • Update and finalize [what does what] for content_editors, edev, and administrators
  • Update tool descriptions in Admin and Editor Howtos
  • Transform unnecessary superdocs to documents
  • Remove old beta docs and unneeded announcements


Phase 2 - Current Feature add/drop

  • Update featureset to include wishlist items (feature blitz)
  • Remove unneeded functionality that will not be ported
  • Examine current buglist for items to fix in next rev
  • Slim down obsolete prefs
  • Announce feature freeze to edev. Examine current patches and run through final ones.
  • Lock patch system


Phase 3 - Feature freeze

  • Put current nodes inside of CVS.
  • Begin writing CVSp (pure perl CVS client) module
  • Write ecore 1.0 CVS integration nodeball
  • Pick elite edev group for write access to the repository.

Phase 4 - Beta site

  • Launch http://beta.everything2.com or similar site with 1.0 features.
  • Get edev involved in new beta site with new features etc.
  • Write and continually update new 1.0 nodeballs for message, everything2, etc.
  • Pull in weblog 1.0 and any other functionality from C2 if possible.

Phase 5 - Cutover

  • Write importer to match new features
  • Stop E2 for a few days
  • Cut data over. Final sanity check
  • Update apache to new site
  • Drink heavily
node.title: The New E2 roadmap
